name: School Management System
detail: A full-featured school management platform with a desktop-based GUI built using Python's Tkinter. Includes student records, fees, and class scheduling.

name: Law Firm Website
detail: A clean and professional static website designed for a legal firm, showcasing services, team profiles, and contact forms.

name: Online Booking System
detail: A web-based booking platform built using Flask for the backend, supporting appointment scheduling and database integration.

name: Hotel Website Sample
detail: A visually engaging static website for a hotel with room listings, gallery, and contact form for inquiries.

name: AI Loan Approval System
detail: A machine learning-based system using the Random Forest algorithm to predict loan approvals based on applicant data.

name: Social Ad Purchase Prediction
detail: A predictive model that utilizes Support Vector Machines (SVM) to forecast user behavior in social network ad interactions.
